articles.description: There are now 295 cases in Jackson County, health officials report.
articles.content:
JACKSON, MI Two new Jackson County deaths caused by the novel coronavirus were reported, Thursday, health officials said.
Eleven new positive COVID-19 cases, also reported on April 23. brings the county to 295 confirmed cases, according to Jackson County Hea… [+2695 chars]
